GAMETES Genetic Architecture Model Emulator for Testing and Evaluating Software 2.2_dev (build 179) 2021/08/09 09:22

Institute for Biomedical Informatics, Perelman School of Medicine, University of Pennsylvania

Ryan Urbanowicz, PhD

GAMETES requires Java 7 or above. You can get the latest version from Oracle

A java executable file is called a 'jar' file and ends with extension '.jar'.

You can download the GAMETES jar file to your computer from here: gametes_2.2_dev.jar.

Once Java is installed, double clicking on a jar file will launch the application.

GAMETES_v2.1_Users_Guide.pdf

GAMETES is most often run with a graphical user interface (GUI).
It also can be run from the command line and supports a plethora of program parameters.
See GAMETES_command_line_help.txt.

For experienced users with larger analyses, there is a number of python scripts designed for use on a Torque/Moab computer cluster.
For easily generating many folders of varied datasets: gametes_batch_on_cluster.py
